DataElement.preferredName: Genomic Segment Hybridization Array Clone Coordinate java.lang.String
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Genomic segment extracted from a library e.g. BAC or YAC library to be used in the genetic manipulation of the animal model. (caBIO)_A molecular biology device that utilizes a set of defined oligonucleotide probes, recombinant clones, or other samples attached in a specific grid arrangement to a solid support for nucleic acid hybridization assays in gene mapping studies or in determining gene sequences, sequence variations, or gene expression patterns.:A group of genetically identical cells, organisms, or DNA molecules.:A number or other designation that identifies a position relative to an axis or grid._Value Domain for java language String datatype.
